SEARCH
Package icu.suc.serverevents

Interface Listener

public interface Listener
A marker interface for objects that can listen to events.

Classes implementing Listener must provide the events they want to listen to via the events() method. Each event returned should have a type parameter corresponding to an interface that the listener implements.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    net.fabricmc.fabric.api.event.Event<?>[]
    events()
    Returns all events that this listener wants to register to.
    default net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation
    phase()
    Returns the phase or stage at which this listener should be executed.

  • Method Details

    • events

      net.fabricmc.fabric.api.event.Event<?>[] events()
      Returns all events that this listener wants to register to.

      The listener is expected to implement the type parameter T of each event returned. Registration is typically done via ServerEvents.register(Listener).

      Returns:
      an array of events that this listener should be registered to

    • phase

      default net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation phase()
      Returns the phase or stage at which this listener should be executed.

      By default, listeners are executed in Event.DEFAULT_PHASE. Implementing classes can override this method to specify a custom phase.

      Returns:
      the ResourceLocation representing the execution phase of this listener
